channel.title: Maintenance on LABSIM
channel.description: Recent content in Maintenance on LABSIM

item.title: Update 3. Катюша.
item.description: Катюша. Update 3. Major update : Split of the Team section into Members <-> Users to enhance visibility & role of each participant inside the LABSIM structure. Added a lot of content to LABSIM technical documentation website. Next update : correct the other, yet undiscovered, error. Cheers.

item.title: Update 2. Open Beta.
item.description:
Open Beta. Update 2. Minors update : added some member to team mate board but it stil lacks some role & capture… Major update : Added the About page which describe LABSIM capabilities & facilities. Next update : finish & polish team mate board. add content to LABSIM technical documentation website. correct the other, yet undiscovered, error.
Cheers.

item.title: Update 1. Open Beta.
item.description: Open Beta. Update 1. Minors update : added phd(s) to team mate board. corrected some error… added alpha technical doc website + binding but it remains under heavy construction. feedbacks are welcome. added alpha personnal profile exemple on team board based on Academic Theme for HUGO. This second link is far more complete. feedbacks are welcome. Next update : finish & polish team mate board.

item.title: Update 0. Open Beta.
item.description: Open Beta Update 0. Minors update : team now follow actual composition. Maybe we should add phd affiliate ? Under a specific section ? or not ?. team mate now have a pretty face, a correct role & branch/department/unit classification. corrected some error… add binding to disqus. It allow visitor to freely discuss around blog article. Next update : finalize team mate board (picture + role)
